alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Coffee, northwestern Bacon, Jeff Davis and west central Appling Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 158 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Snipesville, or 9 miles south of Hazlehurst. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Hazlehurst, Snipesville and Denton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
